document_data.name: Minthra Mhandyvver
document_data.mainbody: '''Minthra Mhandyvver''', usually known as '''Minny''', was a shopkeeper in [[Red Larch]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis of [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Minny had the demeanor of a kindly, old dodderer, but she was very sharp. She, among other things, knew the identities of most of the [[Believers]] members but believed them harmless.
document_data.Activities: Minny managed a poultry shop with her three grown children in the village.
document_data.History: In 1491, Minny was worried for her adventurous young granddaughter, [[Pell Mhandyvver]], who had had an unpleasant adventure in the [[Haunted Tomb]].
